title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM, embeddings and chat interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Conversational TUI for Ollama written in Go; supports chat history, markdown, syntax highlight.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Bring local Ollama models into VS Code as a GitHub Copilot replacement with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple retrieval-augmented-generation stack using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain for private docs.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; chat, generate, pull, list, delete, embeddings.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chat frontend that talks to your local Ollama instance over REST.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and persistent model cache.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embeddings, model management; targets .NET 6+.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models; slash commands, threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama: mention the bot or use slash commands to chat with local LLMs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API; includes chat, generate, pull, embed.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, or translate text via Ollama.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve deployment recipe for scaling Ollama models across GPU workers with autoscaling.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module that injects an Ollama service into your Node backend; decorators for chat & embed.

title: ollama-rustic
summary: Alternative Rust client focused on ergonomic streaming and strong typing for Ollama APIs.
